title: Mort's Eve
content:
Haha, pretty nice coincidence. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mortlol.gif[/img] It's been Mort's Eve for a few minutes here already, according to my clock settings.3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: Mort's Eve
content:
Well, according to my messed up computer clock (needs a new battery. I thought it died or something :-), its 2004!! Wow, how time flies... backwards.-Genius314

title: Indeed.
content:
[hr]Dixie why is there like no gift exchange or... story telling of the legendary hero... or... even a monument
[hr]Someday... for the moment, the best we can do is create mods and other prods for the occasion.

I'd have had something ready by now, but stuff is kinda weird for me at the moment so I'm AFK for a while. Cave assectatorem Ductoris Alacris

A concerned member of the Preservation of Endangered Spleens Society

title: mort's day
content: As for today (mort's day) me and my girlfriend have broken up after 2 years being together. I just had to tell somewhere.[hr]The human brain is not user-friendly...

title: Re: mort's day
content:
[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img] Oh man, I'm sorry to hear that. It's pretty bad it happened to you just today, the day after doing so good stuff (modkeen32).
Well, I guess Mort's Eve is one of the worst days of the year.3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: mort's day
content: IT'S THE IDES OF MARCH, BEWARE.[center]<font color="MAROON">TOUGH GUYS DON'T FOLLOW FADS</font>[/center]

title: Re: mort's day
content:
it's a good thing that mort day cant be on Friday the 13th... can you imagine the double bad luck... [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-surprise.gif[/img] . as for my mort day, my ex-girlfriend called... said that she moved back to Tennessee... this sucks, cause now shes going to want to get back togeather after I got free... why... WHY!?!?!?! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img] . I think this is one of morts evil plans. to make everybody miserable on hes day of reckoning... thats it! hes has a satelit up in space that is sending radio waves that make bad things happen... wheres keen when you need him... probably working on hes BWB because the satelit mad it brake down... this is mort [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mortlol.gif[/img] and this is keen [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img] ...____________________________

title: Past.
content:
[hr]Z-1 As for today (mort's day) me and my girlfriend have broken up after 2 years being together.
[hr]That's awful news. Such a thing should never happen on Keen Day.

One of the things that has me AFK is preventing a similar scenario occuring to me. Lots of things IRL fell out of place over the past three or four months that need correcting. Cave assectatorem Ductoris Alacris
